title: Sketchbook Folio, "The Rape of the Sabines,", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink superimposed over black chalk at center left: Polidoro Roma; at lower left: 27 Polidoro Roma
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Upper drawing of group of soldiers in classical armor carrying off woman; in background classical buildings. Lower drawing of group of men in classical dress carrying three vessels and shield and rushing right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "The Rape of the Sabines,", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on white heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3570-2.
